name: Mr.Mikan's Mikan Harvest Festival
description:
The 1st work of the TREE series!!!
　It's in the middle of cold winter!!!
　The Mikan Harvest Festival begins!!!
　Let's harvest mikan with Mr.Mikan and Miss.Orange!!!

　It pays no attention to the physics, but due to the high numerical calculation, a locus of flying mikan is so exact.
　And also due to the locus particle system, a beautiful locus is drawn.
　Challenge the 60 stages in the beautiful mikan mountain!!!
　It involves the opening and ending!!!

　It's cold but you must be excited by this catching mikan game!!!
